title: Spanish Restaurant Vocabulary
description: Common restaurant-related Spanish words with English translation options.

questions.question: restaurante
questions.meaning: A place where people pay to sit and eat meals prepared and served on the premises.

questions.question: camarero
questions.meaning: A male server who takes orders and brings food to customers.

questions.question: camarera
questions.meaning: A female server who takes orders and brings food to customers.

questions.question: men√∫
questions.meaning: A list of dishes available at a restaurant.

questions.question: reserva
questions.meaning: An arrangement to have a table held for you at a specific time.

questions.question: mesa
questions.meaning: A piece of furniture where meals are served and eaten.

questions.question: servilleta
questions.meaning: A piece of cloth or paper used to clean the mouth and hands while eating.

questions.question: cuchillo
questions.meaning: A sharp utensil used for cutting food.

questions.question: tenedor
questions.meaning: A utensil with prongs used to spear and lift food.

questions.question: cuchara
questions.meaning: A utensil with a small shallow bowl used for eating or serving.

questions.question: plato
questions.meaning: A flat dish from which food is eaten or served.

questions.question: vaso
questions.meaning: A container, typically made of glass, used for drinking.

questions.question: copa
questions.meaning: A stemmed glass for drinking wine.

questions.question: botella
questions.meaning: A container with a narrow neck used for storing drinks.

questions.question: bebida
questions.meaning: Any liquid that can be consumed.

questions.question: comida
questions.meaning: Items that can be eaten.

questions.question: entrada
questions.meaning: A small dish served before the main meal.

questions.question: plato principal
questions.meaning: The main dish in a meal.

questions.question: postre
questions.meaning: A sweet course eaten at the end of a meal.

questions.question: cuenta
questions.meaning: The statement of charges for a meal.

questions.question: propina
questions.meaning: Extra money given to a server for good service.

questions.question: pan
questions.meaning: A staple food made from flour and water and baked.

questions.question: vino
questions.meaning: An alcoholic drink made from fermented grapes.

questions.question: cerveza
questions.meaning: An alcoholic drink made from fermented grain.

questions.question: agua
questions.meaning: A clear liquid that forms the seas, lakes, rivers, and rain.

questions.question: ensalada
questions.meaning: A mixture of raw vegetables served with a dressing.

questions.question: sopa
questions.meaning: A liquid dish typically made by boiling ingredients in water.

questions.question: cocina
questions.meaning: The room or area where food is prepared and cooked.

questions.question: cocinero
questions.meaning: A person who prepares and cooks food.

questions.question: bar
questions.meaning: A place that serves alcoholic drinks.
